item.title: [unf] Push Your Luck
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Reveal cards from the top of your library until you decide to stop. If the total mana value of the cards revealed this way is 7 or less, create a 2/2 pink Teddy Baer creature token. If the total is exactly 7, claim the prize! Shuffle the revealed cards into your library.

Prize — Put five +1/+1 counters on a Teddy Bear you control. It gains haste. Sacrifice Push Your Luck and open an attraction.

item.title: [unf] Swinging Ship
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — After the first combat phase this turn, there is an additional combat phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures that attacked this turn.

item.title: [unf] Swinging Ship
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — After the first combat phase this turn, there is an additional combat phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures that attacked this turn.

item.title: [unf] The Big Top
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color that appears on your top. (A top is an outerwear garment worn on the upper body.)

item.title: [unf] Solaflora, Intergalactic Icon
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Guest

Auras and Equipment you control attached to Solaflora, Intergalactic Icon affect other creatures you control as though those Auras and Equipment were attached to them.

Counters and stickers on Solaflora affect other creatures you control as though those counters and stickers were on them.

item.title: [unf] Questionable Cuisine
item.description:
Sorcery

Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. Create a Food token for each trash can you can see from your seat. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

item.title: [unf] Monitor Monitor
item.description:
Creature — Human Employee

When Monitor Monitor enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

Once each turn, you may pay {1} to reroll one or more dice you rolled.

item.title: [unf] Pie-Eating Contest
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, gobble X. (Each time you gobble, take a bite of food or sacrifice a Food token.)

X target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

item.title: [unf] Lineprancers
item.description:
Creature — Centaur Performer

When Lineprancers enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a power and toughness sticker on a creature you own.

{3}{G}: Target creature you don't control blocks target creature you control with a power and toughness sticker on it other than Lineprancers this turn if able.

item.title: [unf] Stiltstrider
item.description:
Creature — Rhino Performer

Reach

When Stiltstrider enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own.

item.title: [unf] Squirrel Squatters
item.description:
Creature — Squirrel

When Squirrel Squatters enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

Whenever Squirrel Squatters attacks, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token that's tapped and attacking for each Attraction you've visited this turn.

item.title: [unf] Strength-Testing Hammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature attacks, roll a six-sided die. That creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the result. Then if it has the greatest power or is tied for greatest power among creatures on the battlefield, draw a card.

Equip {3}

item.title: [unf] Complaints Clerk
item.description:
Creature — Beast Employee

When Complaints Clerk enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

Whenever you roll a 1, create a 1/1 white Clown Robot artifact creature token.

item.title: [unf] Nocturno of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Performer

As Nocturno of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose a word with five or more letters.

Whenever you cast a spell with the chosen word in its rules text, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [unf] Fluros of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Merfolk Performer

As Fluros of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose a number greater than 0.

Whenever you cast a spell with power, toughness, or loyalty equal to the chosen number, target artifact or creature becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness X/X, where X is the chosen number.

Partner
